text: Ani asa prakare bahuteka anekesvaravadyankarita tyancya daivatanni tyanna barabada karanyasathi ani tyancyavara tyanca dharma sansayaspada banavinyasathi, tyancya santaticya hatyela susobhita banavile ahe ani allahane icchile asate tara tyanni ase kele nasate tevha tumhi tyanna ani tyancya manane racalelya gostila soduna dya
